column1: The Pit Room////By the time we got here
column3: the line was outside the door
column4: wrapped around the porch entrance. And who doesn't stand in a line for BBQ goodies? But you have to get there fast
column5: they do run out of yummy items quickly
column6: such as their Beef Ribs (Flintstones size!). Too bad
column7: I am a huge fan of Beef Ribs and judging from the pictures in other reviews
